00056             class SPK_PREFIX Transformable

00226             inline void Transformable::setTransform(const float* transform)
00227             {
00228                         std::memcpy(local,transform,sizeof(float) * TRANSFORM_LENGTH);
00229                         notifyForUpdate();
00230             }
00231 
00232             inline const float* Transformable::getLocalTransform() const
00233             {
00234                         return local;
00235             }
00236 
00237             inline const float* Transformable::getWorldTransform() const
00238             {
00239                         return world;
00240             }
00241 
00242             inline void Transformable::resetTransform()
00243             {
00244                         setTransform(IDENTITY);
00245             }
00246 
00247             inline bool Transformable::isUpdateNotified() const
00248             {
00249                         return lastUpdate != currentUpdate;
00250             }
00251 
00252             inline void Transformable::notifyForUpdate()
00253             {
00254                         ++currentUpdate;
00255             }
00256 
00257             inline const Transformable* Transformable::getParent() const
00258             {
00259                         return parent;
00260             }
00261 
00262             void Transformable::multiply(
00263                         float* dest,
00264                         const float* src0,
00265                         const float* src1)
00266             {
00267                         // naive matrix multiplication approach
00268                         // warning : no self assignment !
00269                         for (size_t i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
00270                         {
00271                                     for (size_t j = 0; j < 4; ++j)
00272                                     {
00273                                                 dest[(i << 2) + j] = 0.0f;
00274                                                 for (size_t k = 0; k < 4; ++k)
00275                                                             dest[(i << 2) + j] += src0[(k << 2) + j] * src1[(i << 2) + k];
00276                                                 //++dest;
00277                                     }
00278                                     //++dest;
00279                         }
00280             }
00281 
00282             void Transformable::multiply(
00283                         Vector3D& dest,
00284                         const Vector3D& v,
00285                         const float* m)
00286             {
00287                         // warning : no self assignment !
00288                         // w coord of vectors is implicitely 1
00289                         dest.x = v.x * m[0] + v.y * m[4] + v.z * m[8] + m[12];
00290                         dest.y = v.x * m[1] + v.y * m[5] + v.z * m[9] + m[13];
00291                         dest.z = v.x * m[2] + v.y * m[6] + v.z * m[10] + m[14];
00292             }
00293 
00294             void Transformable::rotate(
00295                         Vector3D& dest,
00296                         const Vector3D& v,
00297                         const float* m)
00298             {
00299                         // warning : no self assignment !
00300                         // w coord of vectors is implicitely 1
00301                         dest.x = v.x * m[0] + v.y * m[4] + v.z * m[8];
00302                         dest.y = v.x * m[1] + v.y * m[5] + v.z * m[9];
00303                         dest.z = v.x * m[2] + v.y * m[6] + v.z * m[10];
00304             }
00305 }
